# PORTS.txt
#
# This comma-separated data file provides information about multiplexer ports
# and what conditions they represent. Entries below include: 
#
# 	CSR_PORT: CSR_PORT number, numeric; "0" means all ports [req]
#	CSR_MSMT_VAR: measurement variable: "Rs", "Rh", or "NEE" [req]
# 	CSR_TREATMENT: "None" or experimental manipulation [req]
#	CSR_AREA: optional chamber area, cm2
#	CSR_VOLUME: optional volume of chamber, cm3
#	CSR_DEPTH: optional collar insertion depth, cm
#	CSR_OPAQUE: opaque chamber? Assumed TRUE unless appears below  [req]
#	CSR_PLANTS_REMOVED: plants removed? Assumed TRUE unless appears below [req] 
#	CSR_FAN: mixing fan in chamber? Optional
# 	CSR_SPECIES: optional field describing species measured
#	CSR_SENSOR_DEPTHS: optional sensor depths for gradient method
#
CSR_PORT,	CSR_MSMT_VAR,	CSR_TREATMENT,	CSR_OPAQUE, CSR_PLANTS_REMOVED,		CSR_FAN,	CSR_AREA,	CSR_VOLUME,	CSR_DEPTH,	CSR_SPECIES
1,			NEE,			None,			FALSE,		FALSE,		FALSE,		2025,		30375,		10,			"Sphagnum mosses, Eriophorum vaginatum L., Trichophorum cespitosum (L.) Hartm., Vaccinium oxycoccos L., Andromeda polifolia L., Rubus chamaemorus L., Carex limosa L., Scheuchzeria palustris L."
2,			Reco,			None,			TRUE,		FALSE,		FALSE,		2025,		30375,		10,			"Sphagnum mosses, Eriophorum vaginatum L., Trichophorum cespitosum (L.) Hartm., Vaccinium oxycoccos L., Andromeda polifolia L., Rubus chamaemorus L., Carex limosa L., Scheuchzeria palustris L."
3,			Rh,				None,			TRUE,		TRUE,		FALSE,		2025,		30375,		10,			"Sphagnum mosses, Eriophorum vaginatum L., Trichophorum cespitosum (L.) Hartm., Vaccinium oxycoccos L., Andromeda polifolia L., Rubus chamaemorus L., Carex limosa L., Scheuchzeria palustris L."
4,			NEE,			None,			FALSE,		FALSE,		FALSE,		2025,		30375,		10,			"Sphagnum mosses, Eriophorum vaginatum L., Trichophorum cespitosum (L.) Hartm., Vaccinium oxycoccos L., Andromeda polifolia L., Rubus chamaemorus L., Carex limosa L., Scheuchzeria palustris L."
5,			Reco,			None,			TRUE,		FALSE,		FALSE,		2025,		30375,		10,			"Sphagnum mosses, Eriophorum vaginatum L., Trichophorum cespitosum (L.) Hartm., Vaccinium oxycoccos L., Andromeda polifolia L., Rubus chamaemorus L., Carex limosa L., Scheuchzeria palustris L."
